content.raw: LGTM!  I’ll second my currently existing approval.  I do have suspicions that the Ogre seg faults that we currently have an issue open \(I couldn’t find it now when I looked but I’ll look again shortly\) for are attributed to this PR - I was working a lot on branches w/o selection the past few days and instantly got those same `hlm_directional_light` crashes upon selecting and deselecting.  Other than that, selection worked and stayed consistent.
content.html: LGTM! I’ll second my currently existing approval. I do have suspicions that the Ogre seg faults that we currently have an issue open (I couldn’t find it now when I looked but I’ll look again shortly) for are attributed to this PR - I was working a lot on branches w/o selection the past few days and instantly got those same hlm_directional_light crashes upon selecting and deselecting. Other than that, selection worked and stayed consistent.
